label: Painting II
description: Continuation of ARTS 251. Further develops the materials, skills, and issues introduced in that course; also considers additional painting media; explores and examines traditional and contemporary issues in painting. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: ARTS 251.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: ARTS 251.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Painting or Art Education major(s).
classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
